front.title: Bootstrapping CoAP Applications for Resource-Constrained Devices using EAP

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism to use EAP (Extensible Authentication Protocol) for bootstrapping DTLS-PSK (Pre-Shared Key) ciphersuites and PSK mode of IKEv2 that are used for establishing a secure communication channel between a CoAP (Constrained Application) client and a CoAP server to protect CoAP messaging.
